definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of codes of law, (1) [[הַתּוֹרָה]] as written in the code of the covenant, ‖[[הַמִּחְוׇה]] Ex 24:12 (E); [[ספר תּוֹרַת אלהים]] Jos 24:26 (E); prob. also De 33:4, ‖[[משׁפטים]] v:De 33:10, ‖[[בְּרִית]] Ho 8:1, Ps 78:10, ‖[[עֵדוּת]] v:Ps 78:5; (2) the law of the Deuteronomic code, in D and Deuteronomic sections of Kings and sources of Chr., [[הַתּוֹרָה הַזּאׁת]] De 1:5, De 4:8, De 4:44, De 17:18, De 31:9, De 31:11; [[הזאת]] ´[[דִּבְרֵי הַתּ]] De 27:26, De 31:24, + [[כל]] De 17:19, De 27:3, De 27:8, De 28:58, De 29:28, De 31:12, De 32:46; [[הזאת]] ´[[סֵפֶר הַתּ]] De 28:61; [[ספר התורה הזה]] De 29:20, De 30:10, De 31:26, Jos 1:8; [[ספר התורה]] Jos 8:34, 2Ki 22:8 = 2Ch 34:15; [[דברי התורה]] Jos 8:34, 2Ki 23:24; so [[התורה]] [[אשׁר חוך משׁה]] Jos 1:7, similarly Jos 22:5, 2Ki 17:13, 2Ki 17:34, 2Ki 17:37, 2Ki 21:8; [[תּוֹרַת משׁה]] ([[ספר]]) Jos 8:31, Jos 8:32, Jos 23:6, 1Ki 2:3, 2Ki 14:6 = ´[[בספר מ]] ´[[הַתּ]] 2Ch 25:4, 2Ki 23:25; ´[[דִּבְרֵי סֵפֶר הַתּ]] 2Ki 22:11= ´[[דברי הַתּ]] 2Ch 34:19; [[תּוֹרַת יהוה]] 2Ki 10:31. It is probable that ´[[ת]] in Ps 1:2, Ps 1:2, Ps 94:12 and some other parts of Chr., e.g. 1Ch 22:12, 2Ch 6:16 (= 1Ki 8:25 without ´[[ת]]), refers to Deuteronomic code. (3) other passages of Chr. may refer to code of D, but most of them certainly refer to the law of the Priests’ code. The same is true of Mal Dn and late Psalm Psalm.
